meanings.definition: The state or quality of being elated.
meanings.sent1: Her elatednesses were evident in her wide smile.
meanings.sent2: The elatednesses of winning the game was contagious.
meanings.sent3: His elatednesses at finding his lost toy was heartwarming.
meanings.sent4: The elatednesses of the crowd filled the stadium with energy.
meanings.sent5: The elatednesses of the children on the playground was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The feeling of joy or pride.
meanings.sent1: The elatednesses in her heart was overwhelming.
meanings.sent2: His elatednesses at receiving the award was palpable.
meanings.sent3: The cat's elatednesses at catching the mouse was amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: The elatednesses in the air made the celebration unforgettable.
meanings.sent5: The elatednesses of the parents at the school play was heartening.

meanings.definition: The act of expressing happiness or excitement.
meanings.sent1: Her elatednesses shone through her dance moves.
meanings.sent2: The children's elatednesses during the party was infectious.
meanings.sent3: The dog's elatednesses at seeing its owner was adorable.
meanings.sent4: The elatednesses in her voice was evident over the phone.
meanings.sent5: The elatednesses of the team after winning the match was inspiring.
